meta.note: Specific field this attaches to (for db_cell mode)

User assigned to approve (links to directus_users)
User who actually approved/rejected (links to directus_users)
Approver's feedback or reason for decision
Prerequisite task that must complete first (links to os_tasks)
Whether this dependency blocks task start
Array of corrections with field, old value, new value

Whether this was escalated to human
AI API cost for this execution
Use this execution for model fine-tuning
Array of artifact_version IDs created by this task

External system job reference (e.g., n8n execution ID)
Project knowledge base - accumulated approved artifacts (cache)
Optimistic locking version for context updates
Whether template is available to all users
Total projects created from this template
Whether this version has breaking changes
Default tasks created with this template
User input fields during project creation
Number of projects using this version
Dot-notation path in project.context (e.g., brand.logo, deliverables.business_card)
Array of directus_files UUIDs (for multi-file artifacts)
Task that generated this artifact (links to tasks)
Why this version was rejected (learning data)
Additional metadata (dimensions, format, AI model used, etc.)
Artifact version being approved/rejected (links to artifact_versions)
Task that generated this artifact (links to tasks)
User who performed action (links to directus_users)
